channel.title: VDO on Joeri JM Smissaert
channel.description: Recent content in VDO on Joeri JM Smissaert

item.title: Advanced Storage: Virtual Data Optimizer
item.description: Virtual Data Optimizer is a storage solution developed to reduce disk space usage on block devices by applying deduplication features. VDO creates volumes on top of any existing block device from where you either create an XFS file system, or use the volume as a Physical Volume in an LVM setup. VDO uses three common technologies: Zero-block elimination to filter out data blocks that contain only zeros. Deduplication of redundant data blocks.
